HPI 8111 Nissan Skyline Skyline GT-R 1992 JTC Series 7th/8th Place K. Hoshino/M. Kageyama

Kazuyoshi Hoshino & Masahiko Kageyama were teammates for the first time in 1992. In their first season together driving for Team Impul they had more wins that any other team in the (all-Skyline) JTC-1 class - 3. Unfortunately, they also had more DNFs than any other team - 3. They could have very well won the championship outright if not for these DNFs.

Here is a clip of one of those DNFs: https://youtu.be/uhPibq4faV8?t=7m51s
